EmailTemplate.description: Case Assigned Notification to Submitter of Outlook origin type English language
EmailTemplate.name: Case Assigned Outlook (SBFE_en)
EmailTemplate.subject: Case has been assigned - {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
Your case #{!Case.CaseNumber} has been assigned to an analyst in {!Case.Type}.You should be contacted shortly regarding your request.
Thank you,
{!Case.Thread_Id}
